    • saveInterviewer

      @PostMapping public Map<String,Object> saveInterviewer(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> req_map)
      Parameters:
      req_map -
      REQUEST METHOD - POST
      { "id": "eba6ee4d-874f-4289-aaad-d47bf796290b", "employee_no": "P0103", "name": "Abhinov Gogoi", "email": "abhin@gmail.com", "phone": "+91 8136073065", "experience": 2, "isInterviewer": true, "job_title": "Software Engineer", "department": "Enterprise Engineering", "business_unit": "Enterprise and Data Services", "location": "Pune", "skills": [ "Angular", "Java" ] }
      Key Sample Data Data Type Constraint Description
      id eba6ee4d-874f-4289-aaad-d47bf796290b String Mandatory if Create
      Optional if Update       		id of the interviewer
      employee_no P0103 String Mandatory Emp No as per KEKA
      name Abhinov Gogoi String Mandatory Employee name
      email abhinav@clairvoyantsoft.com String Mandatory Employee company email
      phone +91 7489286478 String Optional Employee contact no
      experience 2 Integer Mandatory Employee experience in years
      isInterviewer true String Mandatory Whether this Employee is eligible to take interviews
      job_title Software Engineer II String Optional Employee Job title as per listing
      department Enterprise Engineering String Optional Employee department as per listing
      business_unit Enterprise and Data Services String Optional Employee business unit as per listing
      location Pune String Optional Employee location as per listing
      skills ["Angular","Java"] String Optional Employee skills as per listing
      @apiNote headers
      Header Key Sample Data Data Type Constraint Description
      TOKEN G6G57HfD49HPl String Mandatory user token
      LOGIN_ID admin String Mandatory login id / username

      Returns:
      SUCCESS MESSAGE:
      {"MESSAGE":"Data updated successfully","STATUS":"Success"}
      ERROR MESSAGE:
      {"EXCEPTION":"Invalid Token","MESSAGE":"TOKEN missing in request header","STATUS":"Error"}
      {"EXCEPTION":"Invalid Token","MESSAGE":"Invalid TOKEN for given LOGIN_ID :: admin","STATUS":"Error"}
      See Also:
      • Functionality: This API is used to save interviewer (create/update)

    • getInterviewers

      @GetMapping public Map<String,Object> getInterviewers(@RequestParam(value="id",required=false) String id)
      @apiNote REQUEST METHOD - GET

      Key Sample Data Data Type Constraint Description
      id eba6ee4d-874f-4289-aaad-d47bf796290b or ALL String Optional id of the interviewer or ALL
      Header Key Sample Data Data Type Constraint Description
      TOKEN G6G57HfD49HPl String Mandatory user token
      LOGIN_ID admin String Mandatory login id / username

      Returns:
      SUCCESS MESSAGE:
      {"STATUS":"Success","DATA":[{"_id":"eba6ee4d-874f-4289-aaad-d47bf796290b", "business_unit":"Enterprise and Data Services","department":"Enterprise Engineering", "email":"abhin@gmail.com","employee_no":"P0103","experience":2,"isInterviewer":true, "job_title":"Software Engineer","location":"Pune","name":"Abhinov Gogoi", "phone":"+91 8136073065","skills":["Angular","Java"], "updatedDate":"2022-09-11T15:25:08.069+0000","updatedDateMs":1662909908069}, {"_id":"6ad08b90-606b-4740-b803-5f164c18ce86","business_unit":"Enterprise and Data Services", "department":"Enterprise Engineering","email":"mike@gmail.com","employee_no":"P0100", "experience":2,"isInterviewer":true,"job_title":"Software Engineer","location":"Pune", "name":"Mike","phone":"+91 1234567890","skills":["ReactJS","Python"],"updatedDate": "2022-09-11T17:26:22.125+0000","updatedDateMs":1662917182125}]} ERROR MESSAGE:
      {"EXCEPTION":"Invalid Token","MESSAGE":"TOKEN missing in request header","STATUS":"Error"}
      {"EXCEPTION":"Invalid Token","MESSAGE":"Invalid TOKEN for given LOGIN_ID :: admin","STATUS":"Error"}
      See Also:
      • Functionality: This API is used to get ALL or ONE interviewer/s

    • deleteInterviewer

      @DeleteMapping public Map<String,Object> deleteInterviewer(@RequestParam(value="id",required=true) String id)
      @apiNote REQUEST METHOD - DELETE

      Key Sample Data Data Type Constraint Description
      id eba6ee4d-874f-4289-aaad-d47bf796290b String Mandatory id of the interviewer to delete
      Header Key Sample Data Data Type Constraint Description
      TOKEN G6G57HfD49HPl String Mandatory user token
      LOGIN_ID admin String Mandatory login id / username

      Returns:
      SUCCESS MESSAGE:
      {"MESSAGE":"Data updated successfully","STATUS":"Success"} ERROR MESSAGE:
      {"EXCEPTION":"Invalid Token","MESSAGE":"TOKEN missing in request header","STATUS":"Error"}
      {"EXCEPTION":"Invalid Token","MESSAGE":"Invalid TOKEN for given LOGIN_ID :: admin","STATUS":"Error"}
      See Also:
      • Functionality: This API is used to delete ONE interviewer by id

    • searchInterviewers

      @PostMapping("/search") public Map<String,Object> searchInterviewers(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> req_map)
      @apiNote REQUEST METHOD - POST
      { "start_time": "2022-12-18T12:00:00+05:30", "end_time": "2022-12-18T23:59:00+05:30", "experience": 2, "job_title": "Software Engineer", "department": "Enterprise Engineering", "business_unit": "Enterprise and Data Services", "location": "Pune", "skills" : ["React", "Java"] }
      Key Sample Data Data Type Constraint Description
      start_time 2022-12-18T12:00:00+05:30 String Optional filter those interviewers who are free at this time range
      end_time 2022-12-18T16:00:00+05:30 String Optional filter those interviewers who are free at this time range
      experience 2 Integer Optional filter by experience of the interviewers
      job_title Software Engineer String Optional filter by job_title of the interviewers
      department Enterprise Engineering String Optional filter by department of the interviewers
      business_unit Enterprise and Data Services String Optional filter by business_unit of the interviewers
      location ["Pune", "Hyderabad"] List of String Optional filter by location of the interviewers
      skills ["Java", "React"] List of Strings Optional filter by skills of the interviewers
      Header Key Sample Data Data Type Constraint Description
      TOKEN G6G57HfD49HPl String Mandatory user token
      LOGIN_ID admin String Mandatory login id / username

      Returns:
      SUCCESS MESSAGE:
      { "STATUS": "Success", "DATA": [ { "_id": "59cd855a-c691-4aa7-8ddf-6d57ee08f86a", "business_unit": "Enterprise and Data Services", "department": "Enterprise Engineering", "email": "abhinav.gogoi@clairvoyantsoft.com", "employee_no": "P010444", "experience": 3, "isInterviewer": true, "job_title": "Software Engineer", "location": "Pune", "name": "Abhinov Gogoi 222", "phone": "+91 1234567890", "skills": [ "Java" ], "updatedDate": "2022-09-11T18:14:38.757+0000", "updatedDateMs": 1662920078757 }, { "_id": "59cd855a-c691-4aa7-8ddf-6d57assdfs", "business_unit": "Enterprise and Data Services", "department": "Enterprise Engineering", "email": "abhinav.in@clairvoyantsoft.com", "employee_no": "P010444", "experience": 3, "isInterviewer": true, "job_title": "Software Engineer", "location": "Pune", "name": "Abhinov Gogoi 222", "phone": "+91 1234567890", "skills": [ "Java" ], "updatedDate": "2022-09-11T18:14:38.757+0000", "updatedDateMs": 1662920078757 } ] }
      ERROR MESSAGE:
      {"EXCEPTION":"Invalid Token","MESSAGE":"TOKEN missing in request header","STATUS":"Error"}
      {"EXCEPTION":"Invalid Token","MESSAGE":"Invalid TOKEN for given LOGIN_ID :: admin","STATUS":"Error"}
      See Also:
      • Functionality: This API is used to search interviewer based on filters.
        Note that each filter searches based on AND OPERATOR, whereas individual skills will be matched by OR OPERATOR
